DOC.brief_summary: Subjects referred to a sleep clinic had polysomnography (PSG), clinic BP measurements, 24-hour ABP monitoring and HBP monitoring using a device (Microlife WatchBP HomeN) that allows daytime (3 days, 2 duplicate readings/day) and automated nighttime BP measurement (3 nights, 3 readings/night).
DOC.brief_title: Ambulatory Versus Home Blood Pressure Monitoring in Obstructive Sleep Apnea
